title: Authors and Citation
text: INWT Statistics GmbH. Maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: GmbH (2024). MpiIsoData: Data MPI Iso App. R package version 23.03.2.11, https://pandora-isomemo.github.io/iso-data/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {MpiIsoData: Data for MPI Iso App},   author = {INWT Statistics GmbH},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 23.03.2.11},   url = {https://pandora-isomemo.github.io/iso-data/}, }

title: Data for MPI Iso App
text: ReadMe contains instructions : Add New Data Source Modify Existing Data Source ETL process Data Sources Access Data

title: Data for MPI Iso App
text: two ways add new data source depending data retrieved : data source retrieved mySql database -> execute function createNewDBSource() data source retrieved local remote file -> execute function createNewFileSource() Executing one functions createNewDBSource() createNewFileSource() automatically: create new file R/02-<datasource>.R contains function extract data: extract.<datasource>(), add new entry source file R/00-databases.R, (mySql databases) create/update .Renviron file contains database credentials. Files R/02-<datasource>.R different data sources may contain individual extensive data preparations can adjusted manually. details compare e.g. R/02-LiVES.R, read section Modify Existing Data Source.

what: Specify the type of data and the data mapping
title: Data for MPI Iso App
text: ways add data sources (database file), four mandatory parameters must specified: dataSourceName: (character) name new data source, something like “xyDBname”, “14CSea”, “CIMA”, “IntChron”, “LiVES”. name source must contained exactly column name mapping file. datingType: (character) dating type database, e.g. “radiocarbon” “expert” “decimal degrees”, e.g. 40.446 79.982, “degrees decimal minutes”, e.g. 40° 26.767' N 79° 58.933' W, “degrees minutes seconds”, e.g. 40° 26' 46'' N 79° 58' 56'' W mappingName: (character) name mapping without file extension, e.g. “IsoMemo”. mapping (.csv file) must available “inst/mapping/”.

previous_headings: Add a New Data Source > Specify the data source
title: Data for MPI Iso App
text: , database credentials <dbName>, <dbUser>, <dbPassword>, <dbHost>, <dbPort> <tableName> must specified. credentials stored Github, stored file uploaded Github. credentials needed local development testing database connection.
code: createNewDBSource(dataSourceName = <datasource>,                   datingType = <datingType>,                   coordType = <coordType>,                   mappingName = <mappingName>,                   dbName = <dbName>,                   dbUser = <dbUser>,                   dbPassword = <dbPassword>,                   dbHost = <dbHost>,                   dbPort = <dbPort>,                   tableName = <tableName>)

previous_headings: Add a New Data Source > Specify the data source
title: Data for MPI Iso App
text: Data can loaded either local file must stored inst/extdata' folder, remote file, <remotePath> must given, e.g. "http://www.14sea.org/img/" Please set <location> = "local" first case, <location> = "remote" second case. Please, provide <filename> extension (*.csv *.xlsx supported), e.g.  "data.csv", "14SEA_Full_Dataset_2017-01-29.xlsx" Optionally, following can specified .xlsx files, <sheetNumber> integer value .csv files, <sep> field separator character, <dec> character used decimal points
code: createNewFileSource(dataSourceName = <datasource>,                     datingType = <datingType>,                     coordType = <coordType>,                     mappingName = <mappingName>,                     fileName = <filename>,                     locationType = <location>,                     remotePath = <remotePath>,                     sheetNumber = 1,                     sep = ";",                     dec = ",")

title: Data for MPI Iso App
text: Data extraction data sources defined files R/02-<datasource>.R. Within function extract.<datasource>() can retrieve data, modify values like. need ensure points: (done automatically) function name needs extract.<datasource>. <datasource> needs match entry name file R/00-databases.R function needs single argument x. x holds configuration entry R/00-databases.R retrieved data needs single data.frame. Assign list element x$dat return x variables data frame part mapping <mappingId> must available inst/mapping/<mappingId>.csv specified R/00-databases.R processed. minimal example extract function looks like
code: extract.testdb <- function(x) {     dat <- mtcars # dummy dataset      x$dat <- dat # assign data to list element x$dat      x # return x }

previous_headings: ETL process of the Data Sources
title: Data for MPI Iso App
text: Run following commands R install package locally run extract function. Inspect results test. Data nth datasource element res[[n]]$dat IMPORTANT: 5 rows processed test! want process data specify full = TRUE: test n-th datasource execute function like Results object res[[1]]$dat
code: devtools::install() # install package locally devtools::load_all() # load all functions from package  res <- etlTest() res <- etlTest(full = TRUE) res <- etlTest(databases()[n])

previous_headings: ETL process of the Data Sources
title: Data for MPI Iso App
text: Test code running

previous_headings: ETL process of the Data Sources
title: Data for MPI Iso App
text: Code main branch automatically deployed production system MPI server (given successful devtools::check()) main version API App. Respectively, code beta branch automatically deployed beta version API App.

title: Data for MPI Iso App
text: data returned JSON format IsoData: https://isomemodb.com/api/v1/iso-data IsoData (beta): https://isomemodb.com/testapi/v1/iso-data can use following parameters: dbsource category field Example call: https://isomemodb.com/api/v1/iso-data?dbsource=LiVES&category=Location&field=site,longitude Helper endpoints Databases: https://isomemodb.com/api/v1/dbsources Databases (beta): https://isomemodb.com/testapi/v1/dbsources Mapping: https://isomemodb.com/api/v1/mapping Mapping (beta): https://isomemodb.com/testapi/v1/mapping production api use /api instead /testapi

title: Paste file import — addFileImport
text: Paste file import

title: Paste file import — addFileImport
text: fileType (character) type file, "csv" "xlsx" sheetNumber (integer) number table sheet xlsx files, e.g. "14C Dates" sep (character) field separator character dec (character) character used file decimal points

title: Add File Path — addFilePath
text: Add File Path

title: Add File Path — addFilePath
text: fileName name file, e.g. "data.csv", "14SEA_Full_Dataset_2017-01-29.xlsx" locationType type location, "local" "remote". OPTION 1: "local" (file must available inst/extdata/). OPTION 2: "remote" (load data remote path). remotePath path remote file, locationType == "remote", e.g. "http://www.14sea.org/img/"

title: Check Data Source Name — checkDataSourceName
text: Check Data Source Name

title: Check Data Source Name — checkDataSourceName
text: dataSourceName (character) name new data source, something like "xyDBname", "14CSea", "CIMA", "IntChron", "LiVES". name source must contained exactly column name mapping file. isTest (logical) TRUE testing

title: Clean up database — cleanUp
text: Clean database

title: Clean up database — cleanUp
text: mappings mappings used sources sources used

title: Clean Up Script — cleanUpScript
text: Clean Script

title: Clean Up Script — cleanUpScript
text: script (character) script extract data

title: Create New DB Source — createNewDBSource
text: Creates script new data source database connection sets .Renviron variables. "mySql" databases supported.

title: Create New DB Source — createNewDBSource
code: createNewDBSource(   dataSourceName,   datingType,   coordType,   mappingName,   dbName,   dbUser,   dbPassword,   dbHost,   dbPort,   tableName,   scriptFolder = "R",   rootFolder = ".",   isTest = FALSE )

title: Create New DB Source — createNewDBSource
text: dataSourceName (character) name new data source, something like "xyDBname", "14CSea", "CIMA", "IntChron", "LiVES". name source must contained exactly column name mapping file. datingType (character) dating type database, e.g. "radiocarbon" "expert" coordType (character) coordinate type latitude longitude columns; one "decimal degrees" (e.g. 40.446 79.982), "degrees decimal minutes" ("40° 26.767' N" "79° 58.933' W"), "degrees minutes seconds" ("40° 26' 46” N" "79° 58' 56” W") mappingName (character) name mapping without file extension, e.g. "IsoMemo". mapping (.csv file) must available "inst/mapping/". dbName (character) database name dbUser (character) database user dbPassword (character) database password dbHost (character) database host dbPort (character) database port tableName name table containing data scriptFolder (character) place store scripts. rootFolder (character) root folder package, usually containing .Renviron, DESCRIPTION, ... isTest (logical) TRUE automatic testing

title: Create New File Source — createNewFileSource
text: Creates script new data source local remote file. "csv" "xlsx" files supported.

title: Create New File Source — createNewFileSource
code: createNewFileSource(   dataSourceName,   datingType,   coordType,   mappingName,   locationType,   fileName,   remotePath = NULL,   sheetNumber = 1,   sep = ";",   dec = ",",   scriptFolder = "R",   isTest = FALSE )

title: Create New File Source — createNewFileSource
text: dataSourceName (character) name new data source, something like "xyDBname", "14CSea", "CIMA", "IntChron", "LiVES". name source must contained exactly column name mapping file. datingType (character) dating type database, e.g. "radiocarbon" "expert" coordType (character) coordinate type latitude longitude columns; one "decimal degrees" (e.g. 40.446 79.982), "degrees decimal minutes" ("40° 26.767' N" "79° 58.933' W"), "degrees minutes seconds" ("40° 26' 46” N" "79° 58' 56” W") mappingName (character) name mapping without file extension, e.g. "IsoMemo". mapping (.csv file) must available "inst/mapping/". locationType type location, "local" "remote". OPTION 1: "local" (file must available inst/extdata/). OPTION 2: "remote" (load data remote path). fileName name file, e.g. "data.csv", "14SEA_Full_Dataset_2017-01-29.xlsx" remotePath path remote file, locationType == "remote", e.g. "http://www.14sea.org/img/" sheetNumber (integer) number table sheet xlsx files, e.g. "14C Dates" sep (character) field separator character dec (character) character used file decimal points scriptFolder (character) place store scripts. isTest (logical) TRUE automatic testing

title: Default Vars — defaultVars
text: Variables stored table " mappingName _data" server

title: Default Vars — defaultVars
text: mappingName (character) name mapping without file extension, e.g. "IsoMemo". mapping (.csv file) must available "inst/mapping/".

text: Variables column table " mappingName _data" server

title: Prepare Data — prepareData
text: Prepares data within transform step ETL. Following updates done: types variables set, latitude longitude converted decimal degrees, implausible latitude longitude values deleted, DOIs added.

title: Prepare Data — prepareData
text: isoData mapped data mapping mapping table used coordType (character) coordinate type latitude longitude columns; one "decimal degrees" (e.g. 40.446 79.982), "degrees decimal minutes" ("40° 26.767' N" "79° 58.933' W"), "degrees minutes seconds" ("40° 26' 46” N" "79° 58' 56” W")

title: Setup Renviron — setupRenviron
text: Creates updates .Renviron file placeholders new database connection.

title: Setup Renviron — setupRenviron
code: setupRenviron(   dataSourceName,   dbName,   dbUser,   dbPassword,   dbHost,   dbPort,   scriptFolder = "" )

title: Setup Renviron — setupRenviron
text: dataSourceName (character) name new data source, something like "xyDBname", "14CSea", "CIMA", "IntChron", "LiVES". name source must contained exactly column name mapping file. dbName (character) database name dbUser (character) database user dbPassword (character) database password dbHost (character) database host dbPort (character) database port scriptFolder (character) place store scripts.

title: Update Database List — updateDatabaseList
text: Updates list data sources.

title: Update Database List — updateDatabaseList
code: updateDatabaseList(   dataSourceName,   datingType,   coordType,   mappingName,   scriptFolder = "R" )

title: Update Database List — updateDatabaseList
text: dataSourceName (character) name new data source, something like "xyDBname", "14CSea", "CIMA", "IntChron", "LiVES". name source must contained exactly column name mapping file. datingType (character) dating type database, e.g. "radiocarbon" "expert" coordType (character) coordinate type latitude longitude columns; one "decimal degrees" (e.g. 40.446 79.982), "degrees decimal minutes" ("40° 26.767' N" "79° 58.933' W"), "degrees minutes seconds" ("40° 26' 46” N" "79° 58' 56” W") mappingName (character) name mapping without file extension, e.g. "IsoMemo". mapping (.csv file) must available "inst/mapping/". scriptFolder (character) place store scripts.

title: MpiIsoData 23.03.2
text: option add new mapping new sources added functions createNewDBSource() createNewDBSource()

title: MpiIsoData 23.03.2
text: update README.md description add new sources new mapping
